description: This file defines dependencies for the FastAPI application, including a function to retrieve the current authenticated user based on a Bearer JWT token. It sets up OAuth2 scheme integration, handles token decoding, and performs database queries to resolve user identity.

methods.name: User get_current_user(db: Session = Depends(get_db), token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme))
methods.description: Resolver function that authenticates the user by decoding JWT, validating the token, and querying the database to return the current user.

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.pattern: /^def get_current_user(db: Session = Depends(get_db), token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme)) -> User/
